entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Fine - Photo Editor
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Elevate Your Photography with Fine - Photo Editor Fine is your go-to app for professional-grade photo editing, tailored for both enthusiasts and professionals. Experience unmatched editing with intuitive tools and powerful features, putting precision and creativity at your fingertips. Modern Filters & Presets * Explore a vast collection of filters and presets to instantly enhance your photos. Extensive Adjustment Tools * Utilize comprehensive color grading tools for unparalleled photo quality. Advanced Layering * Combine photos, stickers, and doodles for unique compositions with precise layer adjustments. Text Tools * Access dynamic text tools with a plethora of styles, effects, and templates for every need. Framing & Distortion Correction * Choose from a wide range of frames for a polished photo finish, from modern to classic designs. * Correct distortions with precision tools to maintain flawless image geometry. Selective Editing & Advanced Masking * Use advanced AI detection for subjects, skies, and hair for effortless, detailed edits. * Apply selective tools for color and luminance, along with shape masks, for precise adjustments. Innovative Blur & Sky Replacement * Achieve professional DSLR-like blur and depth with AI technology. * Instantly change skies to dramatically enhance your scenes. Batch Processing * Batch edit and export photos to enhance your efficiency. Editable History * Reedit your adjustments with the editable history tool. * Boost your editing capabilities with version tools. Unleash your creativity with Fine - Photo Editor, where state-of-the-art technology meets user-friendly design. Download now and transform your photos like never before!
